articles.author: ELAINE KURTENBACH
articles.title: Stock market today: Asian markets are mixed after Wall Street edges back from its record - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Shares were mixed in thin Asian trading on Monday after U.S. stocks edged back from their all-time high.  Oil prices fell and U.S. futures sank, while...
articles.content:
BANGKOK (AP) Shares were mixed in thin Asian trading on Monday after U.S. stocks edged back from their all-time high.
Oil prices fell and U.S. futures sank, while Chinese shares shed some of their e… [+3881 chars]
